block.minecraft.oak_log.desc:
The log of an oak tree, commonly found in forests.
Used extensively in crafting.
block.minecraft.acacia_log.desc:
The log of an acacia tree, commonly found in forests.
Used extensively in crafting.
item.minecraft.emerald.desc:
A gemstone that is a variety of the mineral Beryl, colored green by trace amounts of chromium and occasionally vanadium.
Poor resistance to breakage.
item.minecraft.iron_ingot.desc:
A metal that is both common and sturdy. Smelts at 1500 Â°C.
Atomic number 26 on the Periodic Table.
